




Biden, Joe. “Plan to Strengthen Organized Labor and Collective Bargaining: Joe Biden.” Joe 
    Biden for President: Official Campaign Website, 11 Oct. 2020, 
    https://joebiden.com/empowerworkers/.

https://www.history.com/topics/19th-century/labor#:~:text=The%20labor%20movement%20in%20the,hours%20and%20safer%20working%20conditions.

Reagan Foundation. “Remarks and Q & A with Reporters on the Air Traffic Controllers 
    (PATCO) Strike.” YouTube, 1 Dec. 2009, https://youtu.be/j3ZTCPJ39LA. 

“The 50th Anniversary of Martin Luther King, Jr.'s ‘All Labor Has Dignity.’” Beacon Broadside: 
    A Project of Beacon Press, 18 Mar. 2018, https://www.beaconbroadside.com/broadside/2018/03/the-50th-anniversary-of-martin-luther-king-jrs-all-labor-has-dignity.html.
